GSD.product_version: versions from v3.13 to before v5.15.87
GSD.description:
nfc: Fix potential resource leaks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.87 by commit b63bc2db244c1b57e36f16ea5f2a1becda413f68, it was introduced in version v3.13 by commit 5ce3f32b5264b337bfd13a780452a17705307725. For more details please see the references link.
